cast.overview: Based on Frank Miller's graphic novel, "300" is very loosely based the 480 B.C. Battle of Thermopylae, where the King of Sparta led his army against the advancing Persians; the battle is said to have inspired all of Greece to band together against the Persians, and helped usher in the world's first democracy.

The ultimate X-Men ensemble fights a war for the survival of the species across two time periods as they join forces with their younger selves in an epic battle that must change the past – to save our future.
cast.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past

details.biography: Alex Ivanovici is an Italian-Canadian actor. He is known for his roles as Ephor #2 in 300 (2006), Bartolomeo d'Alviano in Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood (2010), Rick Trager in Outlast (2013), Quarantine Doctor in X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014), Doc in Rainbow Six: Siege (2015), Talos Rucker in Deus Ex: Mankind Divided (2016), and Cosmo/Lipless in Marvels: Guardians of the Galaxy (2021).
details.name: Alex Ivanovici
